item.description:

item.title: The west side of the pedestrian bridge crossing the railway was completely covered in water today after heavy rain. I could not avoid having to step in it resulting in a wet foot., 4th December
item.description:
After rain, water builds up completely covering the pedestrian bridge. Water also builds up on the east side as well, but can be avoided - just.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queensway, Petts Wood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
